Dogs.name: Corgi
Dogs.shortDescription: A small, friendly, short-legged beast best known for being friends with Queen Elizabeth II.

Dogs.name: Dalmatian
Dogs.shortDescription: Well known as Firehouse Dogs, Dalmatians have a distinctive white coat with black spots.

Dogs.name: German Shepard
Dogs.shortDescription: A medium to large dog bred as a working dog. Also known as Alsatian, German Shepards are very recognizable.

Dogs.name: Golden Retriever
Dogs.shortDescription: A medium to large dog bred as a retriever for fowl hunting. They are wll known as friendly and energetic dogs and well loved for their golden coat.

Dogs.name: Husky
Dogs.shortDescription: A medium breed of working dog. Well known for their thick coat and distinctive markings.

Cats.name: Bengal
Cats.shortDescription: A larger than average domesticated cat. Known for having rosette markings similar to a leapord.

Cats.name: Maine Coon
Cats.shortDescription: The largest breed of domesticated cat. Known to grow much larger than average cats. Can grow to nearly four feet long from head to tail.

Cats.name: Persian
Cats.shortDescription: A very soft breed of domesticated cat. Known for the Grumpy Cat meme.

Cats.name: Russian Blue
Cats.shortDescription: An average sized breed of domesticated cat. Russian Blues have silky fur in a thick coat. This makes them good cats for people with alergies since their coat keeps the allergens clos to the skin.

Cats.name: Siamese
Cats.shortDescription: A very pretty cat breed, Known for their bright blue eyes and very distinctive appearance.
